talk.author: did:plc:a6gdtkuncuru3ffs34sjcc4w
talk.utter:
Open borders, college loan forgiveness, price controls, higher corporate taxes, higher taxes on anyone making over $200,000, relaxing oil restrictions in Iran, restricting federal oil lands in American businesses, loans based upon race.  

Do you want me to continue?

talk.author: did:plc:puqzulsunae2g3f44thfoq3y
talk.utter: That's not what I asked. I enquired why you think student loan forgiveness is a problem. Let's go one at a time.

talk.author: did:plc:a6gdtkuncuru3ffs34sjcc4w
talk.utter: Why give loan forgiveness to a particular group.  17.4% of those with loan forgiveness had an annual income from $152,000- $240,000.  23.9% were between $92,000-$151,000.  Over 40% of those that received forgiveness have incomes more than double the average income of all Americans.

talk.author: did:plc:puqzulsunae2g3f44thfoq3y
talk.utter: Well, the loan forgiveness plan was already halted by the SC..before May this year. All there is are repayment reduction plans and deferred payment for working people. Forgiveness occurs only after 25 years repaying and the income threshhold for 0%-30% is now very low. See relevant Gov website.
